name: Gone in 10 Seconds
description:
Master car thief Kentucky Sands has retired to a monastery in Nepal but can he be talked back into action for one last job?

This is an old entry for Ludum Dare and is pretty short and rough around the edges. It's a solo effort although thanks are due to Nicholas Cage for all his spiritual guidance!

WASD to move and Space to advance the conversation. Arrow keys to turn the ignition.

DISCLAIMER: I take no responsibility for anyone using the techniques outlined in this game to actually steal cars. :)
